# The `NumberedValues` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Mapping from value <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> to value, which also remembers what the next unused <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> is. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Mapping from value <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> to value, which also remembers what the next unused <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> is.

Definition at line 18 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/asmparser/numberedvalues-h">NumberedValues.h</a>.
